info.title: ProductAPI
info.description: Public API for product related data

post.description: create product. (only used internally, for now)

post.summary: deprecated - Start an import of a product
post.description: deprecated - Use this endpoint for initiating an import of a product - Used by the product upload service.

post.summary: Start an import of a product
post.description:
Use this endpoint for initiating an import of a product.

Be wary that this is an async import. The body is validated and sent to a queue.

When the same body is sent a second time, it will not be processed, but a 201 will be returned.  If you notice that a product is not imported in Tilroy, there is no use of sending the same request again, as this will be ignored.

post.summary: Use to update the lifeStatus and costPrice of all skus of a product
post.description: Use to update the lifeStatus and costPrice of all skus of a product. All Ids are used merely as idenditiers, when both are passed only tilroyId is used. Be wary of calling this endpoint in rapid sucession, as this is an async import (gets sent to a queue), previous updates might be overwritten.

post.summary: Start an import of the data for a shop product combination
post.description: Use this endpoint for initiating an import of a shop product.

put.description: Use this endpoint for updating an existing product. The (partial) product will be merged with the existing product.

get.description: Use this endpoint to get and existing product by id.
Use this endpoint to get and existing product by Tilroy ID.

headerTilroyApiKey.name: Tilroy-Api-Key
headerTilroyApiKey.description: API key to identify and validate the tenant

sourceId.name: sourceId
sourceId.description: the source ID of the product

tilroyId.name: tilroyId
tilroyId.description: the tilroy ID of the product

pagingCount.name: count
pagingCount.description: Number of returned results per page, max is 1000.

pagingPage.name: page
pagingPage.description: Number of the wanted page of results.

queryFields.name: fields
queryFields.description: Comma-separated list of all fields you want returned in the result. All other fields will be omitted.

queryCode.name: code
queryCode.description: search on product code (if both "code" and "skuSourceId" are passed, only "skuSourceId" is used).

queryColourCode.name: colourCode
queryColourCode.description: search on colourCode (only works in tandem with "code" and "sizeCode" query parameters)

querySizeCode.name: sizeCode
querySizeCode.description: search on sizeCode (only works in tandem with "code" and "colourCode" query parameters)

queryBarcodes.name: barcodes
queryBarcodes.description: comma separated list of barcodes to search for (only returns skus with these barcodes)

Link-JSON.description: JSON version of the Link header.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

Error.description: The error object returned by the service

code.description: Code of the error, assigned by Node or the developer.

message.description: More information about the cause of the error.

ProductImport.description: oldest object used for importing products (with the capitalized properties)

serialNumberSale.description: indication if a product requires a serial number on sale

visibleOnline.description: product can be sold in the webshop

maxDiscount.description: maximum discount that can be applied to a product. 0= no discount allowed 1-99=between 1% and 99% discount allowed 100=no restriction on discount

sellUnique.description: every item will be a seperate line in the basket, so always lines with quantity 1

sizeRange.description: size range is manditory, can be default if no size range applicable

supplier.description: supplier is manditory, can be defaulted

countryVats.description: VAT applicable by Country. Should be defined for at least one country and for all countries of the shops

gender.description: Gender for the product, is mandatory can be default value if gender is not applicable

groupLevels.description: Product groups this product belongs to.	At least one product group should be defined

useInCalculations.description: use this product in next sale discount calculations

useInPricesAndPromotions.description: use this product in next sale discount prices and promotions calculations

tilroyId.description: Unique Tilroy id for the product

locations.description: deprecated: moved to skus (locations where the product is available)

tilroyId.description: unique Tilroy id for the shop

webName.description: product name in the webshop in the specified language

UOM.description: Unit information of the product, only one unit possible for a product

showOnline.description: must the unit be shown online

singular.description: description of the unit singular in the specified language

plural.description: description of the unit plural in the specified language

webSingular.description: description of the unit singular in the webshop in the specified language

webPlural.description: description of the unit plural in the webshop in the specified language

tilroyId.description: Unique Tilroy id for the supplier

preferred.description: Only 1 supplier can be the preferred supplier.

tilroyId.description: Unique Tilroy id for the supplier

costPrice.description: Currently active cost VAT inc price

GroupLevel.description: The group a product belongs to

level.description: Level of the product group >= 1, must start with 1 and not have gaps

code.description: Code of the product group, must be unique

supplierReference.description: Supplier Reference of the specified product in this colour

tilroyId.description: Unique Tilroy id for the colour

consumerPrice.description: initial retail VAT inc standard price. This field is usefull when creating/updating products, but might be incorrect when retrieving products. Use the price api to retrieve the correct price!

costPrice.description: Currently active cost VAT inc price

createInternalBarcode.description: when set Tilroy will create internal barcode that is used on price labels

wholeSalePrice.description: initial wholesale price. This field is usefull when creating/updating products, but might be incorrect when retrieving products. Use the price api to retrieve the correct price!

tilroyId.description: Unique Tilroy id for the SKU

quantity.description: In case quantity is set, it represents the number of sku's that should added to the transaction

isInternal.description: Indication if this a supplier barcode or an internal barcode. Tilroy will use the internal barcode on labels.

order.description: Order of the size in the size rage. E.g. S-M-L-XL (0=highest priority)

tilroyId.description: Unique Tilroy id for the size

isDefault.description: used as default picture on reports and in till. Only one picture by colour can be used as default

sortOrder.description: Sequence of the pictures for this product colour

swatch.description: picture to use as swatch on the webshop, only one picture by colour can be the swatch

showOnline.description: Picture will be used only, eg example technical pictures should not be shown online
